column2: Your seed is strong - and your passion to sow it even stronger.
I burn with passion!
The world is ripe for the taking - and its harvest for your consumption.
More of that for me!
The value of gold is what you make of it.
Gold is meant to be spent!
Tomorrow is an eternity away, and your desires cannot wait that long.
There is no day like today!
A silver tongue is just as strong as a golden coin or iron blade.
Words can bend destiny!
Justice can only be respected if the arms to enforce them is capable.
Might is the seed of right!
Reality revolves around the whims of the worthy.
The world deserves me!
Innocence misplaced is an heir unsown.
But I just want to sing!
He who does cannot devour, cannot expand.
But I'm fine as I am!
He who does refuses to share, cannot expect to be shared with.
But I can take care of my own!
He who sleeps today harvests none tomorrow.
But fate will provide!
He who hides from the gaze of men is unworthy of leading them.
But I can just write messages!
He who cannot lift a man cannot lift his people.
But I can simply just ask!
He who defers credit to others also defers his authority to them.
But I am unworthy!
Men can change with time. You yourself have just proven so.
Perhaps that is best for now.

Inspiring Leadership
This ruler is known for his capacity to inspire his followers. A promising leader!
Exceptional Leadership
This ruler has a natural gift for leadership and to impose authority, towards his followers and beyond. An exceptional ruler!
Paragon of the Gods
This ruler's leadership is only rivaled by the Gods' themselves. He shall rule over the World!
Depressing Leadership
This ruler is misfortunate to possess the majority of the misfortunes that plague man, and his followers are distrustful of him for it.
Disgusting Leadership
This ruler has proven to be more than unworthy as overlord, and men quite actively disrespect him for it.
Cursed by the Gods
This ruler has been cursed with all the faults of the gods, and men actively disdain his right as ruler.
